S03n255:1: rājalakṣmīrapi śreyomārgaṃ nāvṛṇoti saṃvignamānasānāmiti saṃvegaparicayaḥ kāryaḥ |
S03n255:3: bodhisattvabhūtaḥ kilāyaṃ bhagavān vyādhijarāmaraṇapriyaviprayogādivyasanaśatopanipātaṃ duḥkhitamanāthamatrāṇamapariṇāyakaṃ lokamavekṣya karuṇayā samutsāhyamānastatparitrāṇavyavasitamatiratisādhusvabhāvastattatsaṃpādayamāno vimukhasyāsaṃstutasyāpi ca lokasya hitaṃ sukhaviśeṣa ca kadācidanyatamasmin rājakule prajānurāgasaumukhyādaskhalitābhivṛddhyā ca samṛddhyā samānatadṛptasāmantayā cābhivyajyamānamahābhāgye vinayaślāghini janma pratilebhe |
S03n255:4: sa jāyamāna eva tadrājakulaṃ tatsamānasukhaduḥkhaṃ ca puravaraṃ parayābhyudayaśriyā samyojayāmāsa |
S03n255:13: tena ca samayena tasya rājño jātā jātāḥ kumārā mriyante sma |
S03n255:14: sa taṃ vidhimamānuṣakṛtamiti manyamānastasya tanayasya rakṣārthaṃ maṇikāñcanarajatabhakticitre śrīmati sarvāyase prasūtibhavane bhūtavidyāparidṛṣṭena vedavihitena ca krameṇa vihitarakṣodhnapratīkāre samucitaiśca kautukamaṅgalaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaparigrahe jātakarmādisaṃskāravidhiṃ saṃvardhanaṃ ca kārayāmāsa |
S03n255:15: tamapi ca mahāsattvaṃ sattvasaṃpatteḥ puṇyopacayaprabhāvātsusaṃvihitatvācca rakṣāyā nāmānuṣāḥ prasehire |
S03n255:16: sa kālakramādavāptasaṃskārakarmā śrutābhijanācāramahadbhyo labdhavidvadyaśaḥsaṃmānanebhyaḥ praśamavinayamedhāguṇāvarjitebhyo gurubhyaḥ samadhigatānekavidyaḥ pratyahamāpūryamāṇamūrtiryauvanakāntyā nisargasiddhena ca vinayānurāgeṇa apraṃ premāspadaṃ svajanasya janasya ca babhūva |
S03n255:21: atha sa mahāsattvaḥ puṇyaprabhāvasukhopanatairdivyakalpairanalpairapi ca viṣayairupalālyamānaḥ snehabahumānasumukhena ca pitrā viśvāsananirviśaṅkaṃ dṛśyamānaḥ kadācitsvasmin puravare pravitataramaṇīyaśobhāṃ kalakramopanatāṃ kaumudīvibhūtiṃ didṛkṣuḥ kṛtābhyanujñaḥ pitrā kāñcanamaṇirajatabhakticitrālaṃkāraṃ samucchritanānāvidharāgapracalitojjvalapatākadhvajaṃ haimabhāṇḍābhyalaṃkṛtavinītacaturaturaṃgaṃ dakṣadākṣiṇyanipuṇaśucivinītadhīrasārathiṃ citrojjvalaveṣapraharaṇāvaraṇānuyātraṃ rathavaramadhiruhya manoṅatūryasvanapuraḥsarastatpuravaramanuvicaraṃstaddarśanākṣiptahṛdayasya kautūhalalolacakṣuṣaḥ stutisabhājanāñjalipragrahapraṇāmāśīrvacanaprayogasavyāparasyotsavaramyataraveṣaracanasya paurajānapadasya samudayaśobhāmālokya labdhapraharṣāvakāśe'pi manasi kṛtasaṃvegaparicayatvātpūrvajanmasu smṛtiṃ pratilebhe |
S03n255:24: evaṃvidhāyāṃ ca jagatpravṛttāvaho yathā nirbhayatā janānām |
S03n255:30: taṭaiḥ samaṃ tadvinibaddhamūlān hṛtvā tarūllabdhajavaiḥ payobhiḥ |
S03n255:31: bhavanti bhūyaḥ saritaḥ kramena śokopatāpādiva dinarūpāḥ ||11 ||
S03n255:32: hṛtvāpi śṛṅgāṇi mahīdharāṇāṃ vegena vṛndāni ca toyadānām |
S03n255:33: vighūrṇya codvartya ca sāgarāmbhaḥ prayāti nāśa pavanaprabhāvaḥ ||12 ||
S03n255:36: kaḥ saṃprayogo na viyoganiṣṭhaḥ kāḥ saṃpado yā na vipatparaiti |
S03n255:38: iti sa parigaṇayan mahātmā saṃvegādvyāvṛttapramodauddhavena manasā ramaṇīyeṣvapi puravaravibhūṣārthamabhiprasāriṣu lokacitreṣvaviṣajyamānabuddhiḥ krameṇa svabhavanamanuprāptamevātmānamapaśyat |
S03n255:39: tadabhivṛddhasaṃvegaśca viṣayasukheṣvanāstho dharma ekaḥ śaraṇamiti tatpratipattiniścitamatiryathāprastāvamabhigamya rājānaṃ kṛtāñjalistapovanagamanāyānujñāmayācata-
S03n255:42: tacchratvā priyatanayaḥ sa tasya rājā digdhena dvirada iveṣuṇābhividdhaḥ |
S03n255:44: nivārayiṣyannatha taṃ sa rājā snehātpaṣvajya sabāṣpakaṇṭhaḥ |
S03n255:48: athāpi kiṃcitpariśaṅkitaṃ vā mayi vyalīkaṃ samupaśrutaṃ vā |
S03n255:49: tadbrūhi yāvadviramāmi tasmātpaśyāmi na tvātmani kiṃcidīdṛk ||19 ||
S03n255:53: atha kiṃ tarhi naḥ parityuaktumicchasīti cābhihitaḥ sāśrunayanena rājñā sa mahāsattvastamuvāca-mṛtyubhayāt |
S03n255:55: yāmeva rātriṃ prathamāmupaiti garbhe nivāsaṃ naravīra lokaḥ |
S03n255:57: nītau suyukto'pi bale sthito'pi nātyeti kaścinmaraṇaṃ jarāṃ vā |
S03n255:60: jetuṃ kṛtā taripumekamapi tvaśaktāstanme matirbhavati dharmamabhiprapattum ||23 ||
S03n255:62: sārdhaṃ balairatibalasya tu mṛtyuśatrormanvādayo'pi vivaśā vaśamabhyupetāḥ ||24 ||
S03n255:64: mattā dvipā yudhi rathāṃśca narān dvīpāṃśca |
S03n255:70: bhittvaiva ca śrutamanāṃsi ravaiḥ pareṣāṃ mṛtyuṃ sametya hatadarpabalāḥ svapanti ||27 ||
S03n255:71: doṣānurūpaṃ praṇayanti daṇḍaṃ kṛtāparādheṣu nṛpāḥ pareṣu |
S03n255:72: mahāparādhe yadi mṛtyuśatrau na daṇḍanītipravaṇā bhavanti ||28 ||
S03n255:111: dṛptānapi pratinudantyasurān surendrā dṛptānapi pratinudantyasurāḥ surāṃśca |
S03n255:112: mānādhirūḍhamatibhiḥ sumudīrṇasainyaistaiḥ saṃhatairapi tu mṛtyurajayya eva ||40 ||
S03n255:114: na manyunā snehaparikṣayeṇa vā prayāmi dharmāya tu niścito vanam ||41 ||
S03n255:115: rājovāca-atha vane tava ka āśvāsaḥ evamapratikriye mṛtyubhaye sati dharmaparigrahe ca |
S03n255:116: kiṃ tvā vane na samupaiṣyati mṛtyuśatru-
S03n255:117: rdharme sthitāḥ kimṛṣayo na vane vinaṣṭāḥ |
S03n255:118: sarvatra nāma niyataḥ krama eṣa tatra
S03n255:121: kāmaṃ sthiteṣu bhavane ca vane ca mṛtyu-
S03n255:124: dharmaśca nāma vana eva sukha prapattum ||43 ||
S03n255:131: śamaikakāryaḥ parituṣṭamānasaḥ sukhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca yaśāṃsi cārcchati ||46 ||
S03n255:132: dharmaśca rakṣati naraṃ na dhanaṃ balaṃ vā
S03n255:136: kriyāviśeṣaśca yathā vyavasthitaḥ śubhasya pāpasya ca bhinnalakṣaṇaḥ |
S03n255:137: tathā vipāko'pyaśubhasya durgatiścitrasya dharmasya sukhāśrayā gatiḥ ||48 ||
S03n255:138: ityanunīya sa mahātmā pitaraṃ kṛtābhyanujñaḥ pitrā tṛṇavadapāsya rājyalakṣmīṃ tapovanāśrayaṃ cakāra |
S03n255:139: tatra ca dhyānānyapramāṇāni cotpādya teṣu ca pratiṣṭhāpya lokaṃ brahmalokamadhiroha |
S03n255:140: tadevaṃ saṃvignamanasāṃ rājalakṣmīrapi śreyomārgaṃ nāvṛṇotīti saṃvegaparicayaḥ kāryaḥ |
S03n255:145: evaṃ vane dharmaḥ sukhaṃ pratipattuṃ na geha ityevamapyunneyam |
